[2]A wave of water rushes forward from the truck, then comes back and washes over the hood, splashing up on the windshield. 
[3]All they can see is the front of the truck, in the light of the "Welcome" sign. They can't see the back. 
[4]No sign of Tom. 
[5]Tom and Karen have disappeared. Karen's boat is still moored to the Sheriff's station roof, empty. 
[6]The ski-boat and jet-ski are right above them, flashlights playing over the water. 
[7]They see a body tumble out of the ski-boat. 
[8]The Sheriff, Phil and Hank are heading toward the church, flaming Molotov cocktails in their hands.
dialogues.WELLMAN:
[1]I -- I'm going as fast as I can. 
[2]Sweeps the money off the shelves and into the bags. 
[3]Yes. We don't keep any of our -- 
[4]Runs up, stopping in the open door. 
[5]Hey, wait! 
[6]Looks nervous for a second, then holds up a clipboard. 
[7]You forgot to sign.
dialogues.TOM AND JIM:
[1]Also clue in, but before they can move... 
[2]Throw themselves back off the crypt as... 
[3]Are behind the crypt. Tom holds his bleeding arm. Jim reloads. 
[4]Behind the crypt, bullets winging by. Jim looks over, sees... 
[5]Exchange a look. 
[6]Jim looks at Tom, then hands Tom his pistol. Tom doesn't know what Jim's doing. Jim slips beneath the water. 
[7]Look out the windows.
dialogues.THE TRANSFORMER:
[1]Water is three inches from the transformer; two inches... 
[2]One inch from the water... 
[3]The water is about to touch. There's a sizzling sound. 
[4]The sizzling is getting louder. 
[5]The water touches the outer casing of the transformer. 
[6]Explodes.
